fields.Name: Skip AssociationDB - Complete Member Journey Timeline
fields.Description: Tests Skip's ability to create a comprehensive timeline across multiple entities showing all activities for a specific member.

InputDefinition.userMessage: Show me a complete activity timeline for member 'Sarah Johnson' including all memberships, events attended, courses completed, chapters joined, and committees served on, with all dates and status changes. Present as a chronological timeline visualization or table.

judgeValidationCriteria: Response includes activities from multiple domains (memberships, events, courses, chapters, committees)
All activities are in chronological order by date
Dates and status information are clearly shown
Timeline covers the complete member history
Visualization or table makes the journey easy to understand
